column2: "Na ɔhen Ahasuerus dze asaasetow too asaase no na po mu nsupɔw no do."
"Na no tum na ne mbanyindze ho asɛm nyinara
column3: na Modekai n’akɛseyɛ a ɔhen no maa ɔyɛe no no ho asɛm no
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Media na Persia ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Osiandɛ Jewnyi Modekai no nye nyia otsia ebien a odzi ɔhen Ahasuerus n’ekyir
column3: na ɔyɛ nyimpa kɛse wɔ Jewfo mu
column4: na no nuanom nyimpadodow no penee no; ɔhwehwɛɛ ne man ne yieyɛ
column5: na ɔkaa asomdwee nsɛm kyerɛɛ n’asefo nyinara."
